title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Lunar New Year Stunt Races
content:
Join up to 15 other players as you use Nitrous to speed through checkpoints and whip around winding racetracks while fireworks and paper lanterns fill the skies above Los Santos in new Lunar New Year themed Stunt Races.

Participate in any of the new races by heading to the Featured Series in Legion Square and rack up 2X GTA$ and RP, while also scoring a limited-time Lunar New Year livery for the Maibatsu Penumbra FF (Sports, 30% off) through February 12.
